definition: borrowing and leaving an article as security for repayment of the loan, leave as a guarantee in return for money
details:
noun
- borrowing and leaving an article as security for repayment of the loan
- (chess) the least powerful piece
- a person used by another to gain an end
= synonyms: instrument
- an article deposited as security
verb
- leave as a guarantee in return for money
= example: leave as a guarantee in return for money
= synonyms: soak
